alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:56PM CDT until May 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LE FLORE COUNTY... At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bokoshe, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Spiro... Panama... Bokoshe... Shady Point... Milton... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
